resources.string:
"
Use \$generate for generate contacts with an specific range. see \$help --generate " "for more details.
Use \$cancel for cancel current working job.
"

"
Use this format to generate contacts:
" "$generate +[Country Code] [number with spaces] to [Country Code] [number with spaces]
" "like: $generate +98 935 123 4567 to +98 935 123 5698
" "note that any differences in numbers format lead to invalid command error.
" "limit: only last part of numbers should be different."
